author: jleroux
msg: Begin to fix things a bit in the example component (related to the layered popups effort)
* consistent names and actions (lookup by Id is not by Name)
* introduces a layered popup for the features
* continue to use height and width as demonstration but with appropriate values

author: mrglavas
msg: Make the download link point to the Xerces TLP download page. This page looks nicer than the Stylebook based one and addresses the concerns raised in XERCESJ-1291 and XERCESJ-1294.

author: jbellis
msg: adding sstables to tracker via constructor was inconsistent with add() method.  r/m constructor code path, forcing use of add() for consistency.  patch by Stu Hood; reviewed by jbellis for CASSANDRA-772
